General.Name: Datavan International
General.Description: DataVan International Corporation provides POS solutions worldwide. The company offers POS terminals; embedded box PCs; touch monitors; touch systems; kiosks; and POS peripherals comprise cash drawers, thermal printers, and facelook and system attachments. It offers solutions for the retail and foodservice industries. DataVan International Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Building H of Far East Century Plaza, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
